name: Totaltetris
overview: A Czech game with many parts translated into English, this is a Tetris game with some bonuses and power ups. The game has 4 "game worlds" which correspond to 4 variants of tetris. Please note the menu has 20, but are not available in the basic version. There is no 2 player mode. A Czech editor is available by booting from floppy disk 4 to increase the number of worlds. Hard disk use is strongly recommended.
